label: W04_WRLD_COMM_000_DETAIL
speaker: UI
text: A large ocean on the other side of the storm. You're seemingly being guided somewhere within it.

label: W04_EVAR_COMM_BASE_CATHEDRAL_STORM_000_DETAIL
speaker: UI
column4: you maybe be able to leave for another world.

label: W04_LTXT_COMM_NORTH_HARBOR_DETAIL
speaker: UI
text: The people of this port choose their business partners carefully. If you don't have a sailboat
column4: they won't even give you the time of day.

label: W04_LTXT_COMM_NORTH_HARBOR_AFTER_DETAIL
speaker: UI
column4: this is an ordinary port that deals in lumber and smoked fish—but there are rumors of other

label: W04_LTXT_COMM_SOUTH_HARBOR_DETAIL
speaker: UI
text: A bustling port that deals in sugar and textiles. Administered by a dependable
column4: honest harbormaster
column5: it is a source of great support for merchants.

label: W04_LTXT_COMM_SOUTH_HARBOR_QUEST_TITLE
speaker: UI
text: The Southern Trade Port Awaits News

label: W04_LTXT_COMM_SOUTH_HARBOR_QUEST_DETAIL
speaker: UI
text: The southern harbormaster is eagerly awaiting your report on the pirate hunt.

label: W04_LTXT_COMM_SHIP_YARD_DETAIL
speaker: UI
text: Pirates and merchants gather in this shipyard
column4: as the craftsmanship of those who work here is valued by fishermen and traders alike.

label: W04_LTXT_COMM_START_ISLAND_DETAIL
speaker: UI
text: Objects caught in large storms often end up here
column4: including the wreckage of multiple ships.

label: W04_LTXT_COMM_PIRATES_ISLAND_DETAIL
speaker: UI
text: This is the headquarters of the White Whales
column4: a pirate band led by Baltasar. They consider all the waves of the Mare Nostrum to be their own private property.

label: W04_LTXT_COMM_PIRATES_ISLAND_010_DETAIL
speaker: UI
text: The pirates are on high alert because of Azure's ship. If only it would just disappear...

label: W04_LTXT_COMM_UZU_DUNGEON01_DETAIL
speaker: UI
text: This is a terrifying whirlpool from which fiends emerge in large numbers. Anyone without the courage to face them should stay well away.

label: W04_LTXT_COMM_BLUE_HOLE_DETAIL
speaker: UI
text: You sense something with incredible power deep in the sea.

label: W04_LTXT_COMM_LIGHT_HOUSE_DETAIL
speaker: UI
text: A strange lighthouse on an island that smells of machine oil. You hear mechanical sounds between the crashes of the waves.

label: W04_LTXT_COMM_CAVE_DETAIL
speaker: UI
text: Strong winds are blowing from inside this cave
column4: making you wonder if it's connected to something. That said
column5: you probably shouldn't go in right now.

label: W04_LTXT_COMM_CAVE02_DETAIL
speaker: UI
text: The pirates have filled the passage leading through the cave. You'll have to sail a raft through the reef in order to reach their base.

label: W04_LTXT_COMM_CATHEDRAL_DETAIL
speaker: UI
text: A dangerous region of the sea surrounded by three rocks. Abnormal weather events are known to happen here
column4: as well as the disappearance of sailors.

label: W04_LTXT_COMM_STORM_01_TITLE
speaker: UI
text: The Giant Cyclone on the Sea

label: W04_LTXT_COMM_STORM_01_DETAIL
speaker: UI
text: It's said Deus Maris created this giant cyclone by accident when he proved unable to control his own power. Trying to go inside would be folly.

label: W04_LTXT_COMM_STORM_02_DETAIL
speaker: UI
text: The giant cyclone has returned. Its winds continue to blow fiercely; venturing inside remains a fool's errand.

label: W04_LTXT_COMM_STORM_03_DETAIL
speaker: UI
text: The chosen location where Deus Maris will ascend to heaven. You will need a large sailboat or upgraded ship to continue here.

label: W04_LTXT_COMM_MERCHANT_SHIP_DETAIL
speaker: UI
text: This merchant ship does business in this area. It doesn't look ready to battle fiends
column4: which makes you worry for the crew's safety.

label: W04_LTXT_COMM_BIG_WAVE_DETAIL
speaker: UI
text: An odd wave that specifically targets sloops. You'll need a sloop if you want to make contact with it.

label: W04_LTXT_COMM_GIMK_PIRATE_SHIP_DETAIL
speaker: UI
text: This pirate ship is manned by Baltasar's minions
column4: and keeps an endless watch. You can't attack them unless they strike first.

label: W04_LTXT_COMM_GIMK_OCEAN_CURRENT_DETAIL
speaker: UI
text: These currents are blocking the path of your raft. You'll need a larger ship if you want to pass through them.

label: W04_LTXT_COMM_GIMK_OCEAN_REEF_DETAIL
speaker: UI
text: These narrow waters are challenging to sail
column4: and best avoided by all but small ships

label: W04_LTXT_COMM_GIMK_BLUE_SHIP_DETAIL
speaker: UI
column4: guardian of Deus Maris. You should stay away for now.

label: W04_LTXT_COMM_GIMK_BALTASAR_SHIP_DETAIL
speaker: UI
text: Baltasar's pirate ship is loitering around the blue hole. What is he scheming?

label: W04_EVAR_COMM_BASE_PIRATE_HUNT_SHIP_BATTLE_000_DETAIL
speaker: UI
text: These elegant pirates managed to steal Deus Maris's egg. If you want to recover it
column4: you'll need to defeat them in battle.

label: W04_EVAR_COMM_BASE_PIRATE_HUNT_SHIP_BATTLE_010_DETAIL
speaker: UI
text: These pirates are seeking to claim Deus Maris's egg for their own. If you attempt to interfere
column4: it's sure to end in blood.

label: W04_EVAR_COMM_BASE_PIRATE_HUNT_SHIP_BATTLE_020_DETAIL
speaker: UI
text: These pirates are seeking to claim Deus Maris's egg for their own. If you attempt to interfere
column4: it's sure to end in blood.

label: W04_EVAR_COMM_BASE_PIRATE_HUNT_SHIP_EGG_HUNT_010_DETAIL
speaker: UI
text: These gruff pirates managed to steal Deus Maris's egg. If you want to recover it
column4: you'll need to defeat them in battle.

label: W04_EVAR_COMM_BASE_PIRATE_HUNT_SHIP_EGG_HUNT_020_DETAIL
speaker: UI
text: These spirited pirates managed to steal Deus Maris's egg. If you want to recover it
column4: you'll need to defeat them in battle.

label: W04_EVAR_COMM_BASE_START_ISLAND_000_DETAIL
speaker: UI
text: If you want to craft a sloop
column4: you'll need the help of a naval architect. Can you find one on this island?

label: W04_EVAR_COMM_BASE_AIR_MONSTER_000_DETAIL
speaker: UI
text: A wild fiend is soaring through the sky. What could it be targeting?

label: W04_GIMK_COMM_BASE_MERCHANT_SHIP_EVENT_000_DETAIL
speaker: UI
text: The naval architect's ship is under attack by sea fiends. If you don't stop them
column4: its voyage will end at the bottom of the waves.

label: W04_EVAR_COMM_BASE_EVENT_UZU_DUNGEON_000_DETAIL
speaker: UI
text: Many a fiend is emerging from this whirlpool. Can you really find a naval architect in so dangerous a place?

label: W04_EVAR_COMM_BASE_SHIPYARD_000_DETAIL
speaker: UI
text: You want to switch from your raft to a ship
column4: but can you really obtain one at the shipyard?

label: W04_EVAR_COMM_BASE_SHIPYARD_010_DETAIL
speaker: UI
column4: you can now switch to a sloop.

label: W04_EVAR_COMM_BASE_SHIPYARD_020_DETAIL
speaker: UI
text: You finally secured the funds for a sailboat.

label: W04_EVAR_COMM_BASE_SOUTHHARBOR_000_TITLE
speaker: UI
text: Reporting to the Southern Trade Port

label: W04_EVAR_COMM_BASE_SOUTHHARBOR_000_DETAIL
speaker: UI
text: You managed to make it back to the Southern Trade Port. Now you must report what happened to the goods.

label: W04_EVAR_COMM_BASE_SOUTHHARBOR_000_BUTTON
speaker: UI
text: Report to the Southern Trade Port

label: W04_EVAR_COMM_BASE_SOUTHHARBOR_010_DETAIL
speaker: UI
text: Deus Maris's egg disappeared along with the cyclone. You must report this to the Southern Trade Port.

label: W04_EVAR_COMM_BASE_SOUTH_TRADE_PORT_000_DETAIL
speaker: UI
text: You were able to recover the contract from the scientist who lives in the lighthouse. The harbormaster will be happy to hear it.

label: W04_EVAR_COMM_BASE_SOUTH_TRADE_PORT_000_BUTTON
speaker: UI
text: Report to the Southern Trade Port

label: W04_EVAR_COMM_BASE_SOUTH_TRADE_PORT_010_DETAIL
speaker: UI
text: You were able to recover the stolen goods from the pirates' base. Will this earn you enough money for a sailboat?

label: W04_EVAR_COMM_BASE_SOUTH_TRADE_PORT_010_BUTTON
speaker: UI
text: Report to the Southern Trade Port

label: W04_EVAR_COMM_BASE_BLUEHOLE_000_DETAIL
speaker: UI
text: What could the contents of the lost goods be? You don't know
column4: but you see something shining ominously from the bottom of the sea.

label: W04_EVAR_COMM_BASE_WQT_STORM_SOUTH_000_DETAIL
speaker: UI
text: A giant cyclone that suddenly appeared on the sea's surface. It's said Deus Maris will return to heaven via a cyclone
column4: but can you get close to it on your small vessel?

label: W04_EVAR_COMM_BASE_WQT_STORM_CENTER_000_DETAIL
speaker: UI
text: The cyclone has appeared once more
column4: and is now swirling furiously. Something within is calling to Ivar.

label: W04_EVAR_COMM_BASE_NORTHHARBOR_WORLDQUEST_000_DETAIL
speaker: UI
text: The northern harbormaster is furious about the missing goods. You'll need to report everything that happened.

label: W04_EVAR_COMM_BASE_CAVE_000_DETAIL
speaker: UI
text: You must pass through this cave to reach the pirates' base
column4: but the fiends within seem fearsome indeed.

label: Ｗ04_EVAR_COMM_BASE_PIRATE_ISLAND_000_DETAIL
speaker: UI
text: The base of the White Whales. If you can infiltrate it without being discovered
column4: you can recover the goods without a fight.

label: W04_EVAR_COMM_BASE_WQT_MYSTERIOUS_LIGHTHOUSE_000_DETAIL
speaker: UI
text: You came here on orders from the southern harbormaster
column4: but will the scientist sign the contract in the end?

label: Ｗ04_EVAR_COMM_BASE_BLUE_DRAGON_SHIP_000_DETAIL
speaker: UI
text: You found this suspicious ship near the blue hole. Will you be able to talk to its captain? If you want to get closer
column4: you'll need to use a raft.

label: W04_EVAR_COMM_BASE_WORLDQUEST_LASTBATTLE_000_DETAIL
speaker: UI
text: An intense battle over Deus Maris's egg is about to begin. Ivar must protect it
column4: no matter what!

label: W04_EVAR_COMM_BASE_WORLDQUEST_LASTBATTLE_000_BUTTON
speaker: UI
text: Begin the Battle for the Egg

label: W04_EVAR_COMM_BASE_WORLDQUEST_LASTBATTLE_010_DETAIL
speaker: UI
text: Various pirate gangs are about to battle for Deus Maris's wish-granting egg.

label: W04_EVAR_COMM_BASE_WORLDQUEST_LASTBATTLE_010_BUTTON
speaker: UI
text: Begin the Battle for the Egg

label: W04_EVAR_COMM_BASE_WORLDQUEST_LASTBATTLE_RAFT_000_DETAIL
speaker: UI
text: You've finally obtained the ultimate raft
column4: but is it truly strong enough to withstand the cyclone?

label: W04_GIMK_COMM_BASE_MOVE_IRONSHIP_000_DETAIL
speaker: UI
text: A suspicious mass that came out of nowhere. Despite the name
column4: it doesn't look like an island. What could be lurking inside?

label: W04_EVAR_COMM_BASE_SHIPYARD_CHANGE_SHIP_TWO_TYPE_000_DETAIL
speaker: UI
text: You must switch to a raft to reach the pirates' base.

label: W04_EVAR_COMM_BASE_SHIPYARD_CHANGE_SHIP_TWO_TYPE_010_DETAIL
speaker: UI
text: You can now switch between your raft and sloop at will.

label: W04_EVAR_COMM_BASE_SHIPYARD_CHANGE_SHIP_000_DETAIL
speaker: UI
text: You can now switch between your raft
column4: sloop

label: W04_EVAR_COMM_BASE_SHIPYARD_CHANGE_SHIP_010_TITLE
speaker: UI
text: Getting to the Southern Trade Port

label: W04_EVAR_COMM_BASE_SHIPYARD_CHANGE_SHIP_010_DETAIL
speaker: UI
text: You must switch to your sloop to reach the Southern Trade Port.

label: W04_EVAR_COMM_BASE_SHIPYARD_CHANGE_SHIP_SLOOP_000_DETAIL
speaker: UI
text: You can now switch vessels—and you sense that doing so will open the door to new adventures.

label: W04_EVAR_COMM_BASE_SHIPYARD_CHANGE_SHIP_RAFT_000_DETAIL
speaker: UI
text: The naval architect seems unsettled by the wait. What could be bothering him?

label: W04_EVAR_COMM_BASE_SOUTHHARBOR_PIRATE_HUNT_CLEAR_000_DETAIL
speaker: UI
text: You defeated the pirates. You should report to the southern harbormaster and hand over the flag you claimed.

label: W04_EVAR_COMM_BASE_SOUTHHARBOR_PIRATE_HUNT_CLEAR_000_BUTTON
speaker: UI
text: Report to the Southern Trade Port

label: W04_EVAR_COMM_BASE_NORTHHARBOR_PARROT_000_TITLE
speaker: UI
text: Curios at the Northern Trade Port

label: W04_EVAR_COMM_BASE_NORTHHARBOR_PARROT_000_DETAIL
speaker: UI
text: Rare goods are now in stock at the Northern Trade Port. What could be on offer?

label: W04_EVAR_COMM_BASE_NORTHHARBOR_PARROT_CLEAR_000_DETAIL
speaker: UI
text: You obtained the items you need to trade for that strange parrot. Is this really a good idea?

label: W04_EVAR_COMM_BASE_BIRD_QUEST_000_DETAIL
speaker: UI
text: Rumors claim the treasure Sigurd left behind is here
column4: but is that really true?

label: W04_EVAR_COMM_BASE_BIRD_QUEST_010_DETAIL
speaker: UI
text: Pedro has stolen Sigurd's treasure and is making a break for it. Will you be able to recover it?

label: W04_EVAR_COMM_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK_000_DETAIL
speaker: UI
text: You found someone adrift at sea. If you don't save them quickly
column4: it could spell their end.

label: W04_EVAR_COMM_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK_REPORT_000_DETAIL
speaker: UI
text: This notebook traveled quite a distance on the waves.

label: W04_EVAR_COMM_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK_REPORT_010_DETAIL
speaker: UI
text: The notebook you are looking for is here.

label: W04_EVAR_COMM_BASE_GHOST_SHIP_LIGHTHOUSE_000_DETAIL
speaker: UI
text: You came here on a sloop. Will the scientist be interested in your vessel?

label: W04_GIMK_COMM_BASE_GHOST_SHIP_000_DETAIL
speaker: UI
text: The scientist's device allowed you to discover the ghost ship. Will you be able to talk to the ghosts inside?

label: W04_EVAR_COMM_BASE_GHOST_SHIP_ANSHOU_000_DETAIL
speaker: UI
text: You'll need a small ship to pass through the reef and reach Dead Man's Bay.

label: W04_EVAR_COMM_BASE_GHOST_SHIP_SUNKEN_POINT_000_DETAIL
speaker: UI
text: This is apparently where the ghost ship sank. Will you find what you're looking for here?

label: W04_EVAR_COMM_BASE_GHOST_SHIP_LIGHTHOUSE_CLEAR_000_DETAIL
speaker: UI
text: You managed to recover the scientist's device from the bottom of the sea. You hope this will make him happy.

label: W04_EVAR_COMM_PIRATESHIP_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK_000_DETAIL
speaker: UI
text: You can hear the voice of someone crying for help. If you choose to ignore it
column4: they will eventually sink into the sea.

label: W04_EVAR_COMM_PIRATESHIP_UZUDUNGEON_000_DETAIL
speaker: UI
text: How should you go about hatching the egg? Baltasar seems to have something in mind.

label: W04_EVAR_COMM_PIRATESHIP_UZUDUNGEON_010_DETAIL
speaker: UI
column4: combat is the key to hatching the egg.

label: W04_GIMK_COMM_PIRATESHIP_GHOST_SHIP_000_DETAIL
speaker: UI
text: An eerie ship that rarely appears in the Sea of the Living. You don't know what's on board
column4: but you sense a powerful grudge from within.

label: W04_EVAR_COMM_PIRATESHIP_NORTHHARBOR_PARROT_000_TITLE
speaker: UI
text: Curios at the Northern Trade Port

label: W04_EVAR_COMM_PIRATESHIP_NORTHHARBOR_PARROT_000_DETAIL
speaker: UI
text: Rare goods are now in stock at the Northern Trade Port. Perhaps you should take a look?

label: W04_EVAR_COMM_PIRATESHIP_BIRD_QUEST_000_DETAIL
speaker: UI
column4: Pedro told you Sigurd's treasure is in the center of this sea. Can his words be trusted?

label: W04_EVAR_COMM_PIRATESHIP_BIRD_QUEST_010_DETAIL
speaker: UI
text: Pedro has stolen Sigurd's treasure and is making a break for it. Will you be able to recover it?

label: W04_EVAR_COMM_PIRATESHIP_BANNED_GOODS_QUEST_000_DETAIL
speaker: UI
text: Something is causing the southern harbormaster no end of worry.

label: W04_EVAR_COMM_PIRATESHIP_BANNED_GOODS_QUEST_010_DETAIL
speaker: UI
text: Contraband is being sold on this ship. You should climb aboard and stop it.

label: W04_EVAR_COMM_PIRATESHIP_BIRD_000_DETAIL
speaker: UI
text: A wild fiend is soaring through the sky. What could it be after?

label: W04_EVAR_COMM_PIRATESHIP_LIGHTHOUSE_000_DETAIL
speaker: UI
text: The lighthouse's scientist master is apparently working on an amazing invention.

label: W04_GIMK_COMM_PIRATESHIP_MOVE_IRONSHIP_000_DETAIL
speaker: UI
text: An object invented by the scientist. Residents of the Mare Nostrum fear it
column4: and call it "that moving island." What lurks inside?

label: W04_EVAR_COMM_PIRATESHIP_STORM_010_DETAIL
speaker: UI
text: Baltasar has sensed something abnormal on the Mare Nostrum.

label: W04_EVAR_COMM_PIRATESHIP_DEATH_COVE_000_TITLE
speaker: UI
text: The Storm at Dead Man's Bay

label: W04_EVAR_COMM_PIRATESHIP_DEATH_COVE_000_DETAIL
speaker: UI
text: A giant cyclone has appeared out of nowhere. Will Deus Maris's egg hatch if you take it inside?

label: W04_GIMK_COMM_PIRATESHIP_BIGWAVE_BEFORE_000_DETAIL
speaker: UI
text: Two waves have appeared before you
column4: and Baltasar claims one is from a killer whale. Perhaps defeating it will help the egg grow?

label: W04_EVAR_COMM_PIRATESHIP_LASTBATTLE_010_DETAIL
speaker: UI
text: Baltasar has Deus Maris's egg. Will you be able to stop him?

label: W04_EVAR_COMM_GHOSTSHIP_SHIPYARD_000_DETAIL
speaker: UI
column4: you must go to the shipyard. But what will you do once you arrive?

label: W04_EVAR_COMM_GHOSTSHIP_BLUE_HOLE_000_DETAIL
speaker: UI
text: This shining area is the Mare Nostrum's deepest point. A blue sapphire is also said to sleep here.

label: W04_EVAR_COMM_GHOSTSHIP_NORTH_TRADE_PORT_000_DETAIL
speaker: UI
text: There are no ships in port; the whole area has a desolate feel. Will you really find the ruby here?

label: W04_EVAR_COMM_GHOSTSHIP_BIGWAVE_EQUIPMENT_000_DETAIL
speaker: UI
text: You sense something menacing within this wave. What could it be?

label: W04_EVAR_COMM_GHOSTSHIP_PIRATES_HIDEOUT_000_DETAIL
speaker: UI
text: Pirates between life and death exist in the Sea Betwixt. Could the ruby also be here?

label: W04_EVAR_COMM_GHOSTSHIP_BLUE_DRAGON_SHIP_010_DETAIL
speaker: UI
text: The ship of Azure the pirate lies between life and death on the Sea Betwixt. What does her presence here mean?

label: W04_EVAR_COMM_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_010_DETAIL
speaker: UI
text: The pirate with Baltasar's heart is on this ship. Will you be able to recover it?

label: W04_EVAR_COMM_GHOSTSHIP_SHIPYARD_010_DETAIL
speaker: UI
text: You have all the gems you need
column4: which means the time has come to leave the Sea Betwixt. Will you be able to escape in one piece?

label: W04_EVAR_COMM_GHOSTSHIP_BLUE_HOLE_100_DETAIL
speaker: UI
text: The blue sapphire you're seeking is apparently here—but before you approach it
column4: you must rescue Azure's blue ship.

label: W04_EVAR_COMM_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_110_DETAIL
speaker: UI
text: Azure has been captured by Baltasar
column4: and you must save her. Thankfully
column5: Ivar knows a secret passage through the reef that can take you to her.

label: W04_EVAR_COMM_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_120_DETAIL
speaker: UI
text: A mysterious and powerful ghost ship is floating in the bay. Who is waiting inside?

label: W04_EVAR_COMM_GHOSTSHIP_LAST_BATTLE_000_DETAIL
speaker: UI
text: The final battle with Baltasar is upon you. You must defeat him and save Deus Maris.

label: W04_EVAR_COMM_GHOSTSHIP_LAST_BATTLE_011_DETAIL
speaker: UI
text: The time has finally come. Make your way to the giant cyclone where Baltasar awaits.

label: W04_GIMK_COMM_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_000_DETAIL
speaker: UI
text: This ghost ship was apparently created as a result of a strong grudge.

label: W04_GIMK_COMM_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_010_DETAIL
speaker: UI
text: You hear a plaintive voice calling from inside the ghost ship. Who is crying out
column4: and who are they searching for?

label: W04_GIMK_COMM_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_020_DETAIL
speaker: UI
text: This abandoned ghost ship sails the Sea Betwixt. You wonder what its story could be.

label: W04_GIMK_COMM_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_030_DETAIL
speaker: UI
column4: yet captivating song rings out here. Who could be singing it?

label: W04_GIMK_COMM_GHOSTSHIP_MERCHANT_SHIP_000_DETAIL
speaker: UI
text: This merchant ship is being attacked by fiends. If you don't help
column4: it won't last much longer.

label: W04_EVAR_COMM_BASE_UZU_DUNGEON_NORMAL_000_DETAIL
speaker: UI
text: This giant vortex keeps spitting out fiends.

label: W04_EVAR_COMM_BASE_UZU_DUNGEON_HARD_000_DETAIL
speaker: UI
text: This large whirlpool spits out dangerous fiends. It's said the person who defeats them on the smallest ship will be famous across the Mare Nostrum.

label: W04_EVAR_COMM_PIRATESHIP_UZU_DUNGEON_NORMAL_000_DETAIL
speaker: UI
text: You sense fiends in this large vortex.

label: W04_EVAR_COMM_PIRATESHIP_UZU_DUNGEON_HARD_000_DETAIL
speaker: UI
text: You sense dangerous fiends in this large vortex.

label: W04_EVAR_COMM_GHOSTSHIP_SOUTHHARBOR_000_DETAIL
speaker: UI
text: The ghost in the Sea Betwixt gave you an axe and bade you deliver it to someone here.

label: W04_EVAR_COMM_GHOSTSHIP_ISLAND_000_DETAIL
speaker: UI
text: You sense the ghost ship you encountered in the Sea Betwixt. Could it be here now?

label: W04_EVAR_COMM_GHOSTSHIP_LIGHTHOUSE_000_DETAIL
speaker: UI
text: You must teach the ghost's song to a person in this lighthouse. Hopefully you can relay it correctly.

label: W04_GIMK_COMM_GHOSTSHIP_MOVE_IRONSHIP_000_DETAIL
speaker: UI
text: This is a masterwork crafted by the scientist in the Sea Betwixt. You sense someone's fighting spirit inside.

label: W04_EVAR_COMM_GHOSTSHIP_UZU_DUNGEON_000_DETAIL
speaker: UI
text: The souls of the ghosts who wander the Sea Betwixt attack any drawn in by the whirlpool.

label: W04_EVAR_COMM_GHOSTSHIP_UZU_DUNGEON_010_DETAIL
speaker: UI
text: This vortex of evil spirits chose to remain in the Sea Betwixt and prey on the living.

label: W04_EVAR_COMM_GHOSTSHIP_UZU_DUNGEON_020_DETAIL
speaker: UI
text: Dangerous evil spirits who enjoy the Sea Betwixt gather in this whirlpool
column4: capturing the living and refusing to let them go.
